sentence.Network_en: 'Never,'answered the mender of roads, recovering his perpendicular.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 没有, ”补路工恢复了直立姿势回答.

sentence.Network_en: He is a good child , this mender of roads, called Jacques.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个补路工是个好伙伴, 叫雅克.

sentence.Network_en: 'Nothing but supper now,'said the mender of roads, with a hungry face.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 现在只有晚饭了, ”补路工露出饥饿的样子说.
